concept.title: What is a Online Booking Travel Agency?
concept.shortdesc: Concept of Online Booking Travel Agency:

conbody.p: In the past, booking hotels required travellers to physically visit a travel agent or the destination.The convenience of online hotel booking agencies allows travellers to easily book accomodations from anywhere in the world. Travellers can easily book hotels online based on their needs and budget using an application or web portal.
